name: Serega Madness Pixel Adventures
storyline: Find out what's hiding in this Pixel World. An exciting story awaits you that will not let you tear yourself away from the screen and take a breath! Find a way to escape from the unknown world, but do not forget that before you leave Pixel World, you will have to fight with Serega.
summary: Serega Madness Pixel Adventures — is a single player horror adventure game set in a pixel world. Solve interesting puzzles while hiding from the insidious horrors waiting for you in the shadows.
